description:
A member of the Student Council. She aspires to be much like Shigure, the current president of the council.
Later she agreed to help Aleida and serves as a partner to Benkei. She frequently uses poetic language when speaking to Benkei. Her purpose of teaming up with Benkei is to ensure that she will be noticed.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Baba Tsutsuji
